text: Valery Belodedov (born 16 June 1971) is a Soviet rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Unified Team Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Valery Belodedov
